Welcome!

Hello! I'm VIGIL AI, your AI-based home security assistant. To best assist you, I need some information about your home.

Initial Assessment

First, could you tell me what type of location your home is in? (Urban, Suburban, or Rural)

Home Security Assessment

Initial Assessment: Rural Property

You've indicated your home is located in a rural area. To provide the best security recommendations, I need some additional information.

  • What is the approximate size and layout of your property?
Providing details about your property's size and layout (e.g., single-story, multiple buildings, acreage) will help me assess potential vulnerabilities.

Home Security Assessment

Initial Assessment: Rural Property, 1300 sq ft

You have a 1300 sq ft home in a rural area with no existing security devices. This presents significant vulnerabilities.

Potential Vulnerabilities:

  • Remote location increases risk of break-ins.
  • Lack of security devices leaves your home vulnerable.
  • Perimeter security is lacking.

Recommendations:

  • Install a security system (burglar alarm, motion sensors).
  • Add exterior lighting.
  • Consider security cameras (at least one at each entry point).
  • Reinforce doors and windows.
Prioritize a basic security system and exterior lighting for immediate protection. Cameras can be added later.
